analysis.key_quote: Reclassifying career civil servants as at-will employees will only create uncertainty and we may lose our most effective workers, which will in turn make our government less reliable and responsive, in general.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses significant concern about the potential loss of experienced personnel and the negative impact on essential government services, indicating a strong opposition to the proposed rule. It emphasizes the importance of a stable, merit-based workforce and the risks of politicization and uncertainty that could arise from the rule.
